betterblockoutline.config.general.info.a:
Whether or not BetterBlockOutline §6replaces Minecraft's block outline
In other words, §6whether or not this mod is active
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.s: Whether or not §6block occlusion for the block outline§r is ignored
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.o: The §6color§r of the block outline, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.f: The §6color§r of the block faces within the wireframe when a block is selected, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.o:
The §6type of wireframe§r that is used when rendering the block outline
§bLine §r- Renders §6only the edges§r, akin to Vanilla
§dStrip - §r§6Connects the verticies§r of the block, looks cool
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.c: Forces the §6outline§r of the block to always be a cube the size of a block
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.o: How §6thick§r the §6block outline§r should be, in pixels
betterblockoutline.config.general.info.c:
Describes how blocks that §6occupy more than one block§r, such as §6beds, doors, and pistons§r, are outlined
§bSeamless§r - Each outline is joined together
§aBlocks§r - Render each block separately
§cNone§r - Don't connect block
betterblockoutline.error.noselectedmodif: You have to select a modifier first!
betterblockoutline.colormodifier.info.ac: Whether or not the modifier is active
betterblockoutline.config.chroma.info.du: Sets the amount of seconds it takes for the chroma to loop.
betterblockoutline.config.chroma.info.of: Changes the offset of the chroma cycle in a percentage from 0-1.
betterblockoutline.config.blink.info.dur: Sets the amount of seconds it takes for the blink to loop.
betterblockoutline.config.blink.info.off: Changes the offset of the blink cycle in a percentage from 0-1.
betterblockoutline.config.blockinfo2d.in: Whether or not §6information about the currently selected block§r is displayed on the block itself
The §6size of the text§r displayed on the block
The §6height§6 for each line of information, in pixels
The §6color of the text§r, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
The §6color of the background§r, in the form of #§7AA§cRR§aGG§9BB
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.note:
Whether or not §6information about a note block§r, including the tuned note and current 
instrument is displayed, when hovering over §6noteblocks
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.reds: Whether or not the §6information about redstone components§r is displayed, when hovering over §6redstone redstone components
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.faci: Whether or not the §6direction of a block§r is displayed, when hovering over applicable blocks
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.bloc:
Whether or not the §6level of fillable blocks§r, is displayed 
when hovering over fillable blocks, such as §6cauldrons or composters
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.wate: Whether or not the §6waterlogged status of the block§r is displayed, when hovering over §6waterloggable blocks
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.open: Whether or not the §6state of being opened or closed§r is displayed, when hovering over §6doors or trapdoors
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.pers: Whether or not the §6the persistence status§r, when hovering over §6various types of leaves
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.dist: Whether or not the §6distance§r value is displayed, when hovering over blocks such as §6leaves and scaffolding
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.laye: Whether or not the §6number of snow layers§r is displayed when hovering over §6snow
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.drip: Whether or not the §6state of being tilted or not§r for dripleaf is displayed, when hovering over §6dripleaf
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.char: Whether or not the §6the number of charges§r is displayed, when hovering over §6respawn anchors
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.bite: Whether or not the §6number of cake bites§r is displayed, when hovering over §6cake
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.aget: Whether or not the §6age of crops§r is displayed, when hovering over §6crops
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.beet: Whether or not the §6level of honey§r is displayed, when hovering over §6beehives
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.leve: Whether or not the §6level of light§r is displayed, when hovering over §6light blocks
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.coor:
Whether or not the §6the coordinates of a block§r for doors is displayed, 
when hovering over §6any block
betterblockoutline.blockinfo2d.info.hotk: Whether or not <hotkey> should be rendered
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.me: Hotkey to open this configuration screen
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.to: The hotkey to toggle whether or not any §dBlock Information is rendered
betterblockoutline.config.hotkey.info.di: The hotkey to disable any visible Info overlays
